advantage1.title: 1. Non-Profit Organization
advantage1.description: As a non-profit organization, our members are exempt from taxes, resulting in substantial savings.

advantage2.title: 2. Insurance Recognition
advantage2.description: The Canadian Tui Na Association (A.T.C.) is recognized by insurance companies, ensuring your clients receive the reimbursements they deserve.

advantage3.title: 3. Membership Card
advantage3.description: Upon joining, you will receive a membership card for easy identification and benefits access.

advantage4.title: 4. Professional Liability Insurance
advantage4.description: Members have access to affordable professional liability insurance, providing peace of mind and protection.

advantage5.title: 5. Career Guidance
advantage5.description: We offer orientation services for members wishing to pursue additional training and professional development.

advantage6.title: 6. Quick Processing
advantage6.description: We process applications within 48 hours of receipt, allowing new members to start practicing quickly.

advantage7.title: 7. Dynamic Website
advantage7.description: Our regularly updated website (tuinaducanada.com) provides access for members and insurance companies for verification purposes.

advantage8.title: 8. Referral Discount
advantage8.description: Receive a $50 discount for each referral, applicable to your next membership renewal or the purchase of products (gels, examination paper, or receipts).

advantage9.title: 9. Flexible Payment Options
advantage9.description: Membership fees can be paid online, by check or cash at our office, offering convenient payment methods.
